wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Gerald Tait (7 November 1866, in Campbeltown – 19 December 1938, in Glasgow) was a Scottish sailor who competed for the Royal Clyde Yacht Club at the 1908 Summer Olympics.He was a crew member of the Scottish boat Hera, which won the gold medal in the 12 metre class.
